actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that National Research Service Awards made under section 472 of the Public Health Service Act shall not be includible in gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that any amount received as a National Research Service Award under the Public Health Service Act is excludable from the gross income of the recipient.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that National Research Service Awards made under section 472 of the Public Health Service Act shall not be includible in gross income.
